text: Live Session EP is an EP released by the rock band Panic! at the Disco on June 13, 2006. It is available only as a digital download from the iTunes Store. It has a more acoustic feel to the songs. ==Track listing== # "I Write Sins Not Tragedies" (Live) – 3:06 # "Lying Is the Most Fun a Girl Can Have Without Taking Her Clothes Off" (Live) – 3:09 # "But It's Better If You Do" (Live) – 2:50 Category:Rock music
title: Live Session EP
